decks.notes: This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with low-cost creatures and burn spells. It utilizes cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Kumano Faces Kakkazan, and Heartfire Hero to deal damage efficiently. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Reckless Rage to control the board. By maintaining pressure and utilizing burn spells effectively, this deck aims to reduce the opponent's life total quickly and secure a victory before they can stabilize. The key strategy is to maintain aggression and apply constant pressure to force the opponent into defensive positions.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively with Spirit creatures, using cards like Mausoleum Wanderer, Supreme Phantom, and Spell Queller to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy is to control the board with disruptive Spirits like Skyclave Apparition and Shacklegeist while maintaining steady pressure. The deck also includes some evasion with Brazen Borrower and The Wandering Emperor to sneak in damage. Overall, the deck aims to play efficiently and outpace the opponent with its tempo and synergy within the Spirit tribe.
